mapper.select: SELECT users.id AS id FROM tbl_user AS users WHERE users.email = #{email} LIMIT 1;

SELECT users.id AS id, users.email AS email, users.photo AS photo, users.nickName AS nickName, users.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, users.gmt_modified AS gmtModified FROM tbl_user AS users LEFT JOIN tbl_cipher AS ciphers ON users.id = ciphers.user_id WHERE users.email = #{account} AND ciphers.cipher = #{cipher} LIMIT 1;
